data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations please note that the management of the Company shall be participating in the Institutional Investors group meetings to be held on 10th Feb 2026 and 26th Feb 2026.

Please note that the aforesaid schedule is subject to change on account of any exigency. 

Please note that no Unpublished Price Sensitive Information (UPSI) is proposed to be shared by the Company during the aforesaid Investor Meeting(s).

The above is for your information and record.

data.caption: Issuance Of Corporate Guarantee
data.news_body: This is to inform you that Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. 4th February 2026 has considered and approved Issuance of Corporate Guarantee.

data.caption: Incorporation Of Wholly Owned Subsidiary/Subsidiary Company Of JSW Cement Limited In Fujairah UAE Which Will Set Up A Cement Grinding Unit (GU) Of 1.65 Million Tonnes Per Annum (MTPA) In Fujairah UAE.
data.news_body: This is to inform you that Board of Directors in its meeting held today i.e. 4th February 2026 has considered and approved Incorporation of Wholly Owned Subsidiary/ Subsidiary Company of JSW Cement Limited in Fujairah UAE which will set up a Cement Grinding Unit (GU) of 1.65 million tonnes per annum (MTPA) in Fujairah UAE.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body: This is to inform you that Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited has in its meeting held today i.e. on 4th February 2026 interalia considered and approved the Re-appointment of Mr. Parth Jindal as the Managing Director and Mr. Pankaj Kulkarni as an Independent Director of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting - Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2025 (Unaudited Financial Results)
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the applicable provisions of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith:

i. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 and
ii. Limited Review Report dated 4th February 2026 issued by Statutory Auditors of the Company with respect to the Unaudited Financial Results and taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting - Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2025 (Unaudited Financial Results)
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the applicable provisions of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith:

i. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 and
ii. Limited Review Report dated 4th February 2026 issued by Statutory Auditors of the Company with respect to the Unaudited Financial Results and taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Of JSW Cement Limited Held On 4Th February 2026
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited has in its meeting held today i.e. on Wednesday 4th February 2026 inter alia considered and approved the following:

1. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025 (Unaudited Financial Results).
2. Re-appointment of Mr. Parth Jindal as the Managing Director and Mr. Pankaj Kulkarni as an Independent Director of the Company.
3. Incorporation of Wholly Owned Subsidiary/Subsidiary Company of JSW Cement Limited.
4. Issuance of Corporate Guarantee.

Necessary arrangements have been made for publishing the Unaudited Financial Results in the newspapers in the
prescribed formats in terms of Regulation 47 of SEBI Listing Regulations.

Further we enclose herewith a copy of the Press Release in connection with the aforesaid Unaudited Financial Results. The above information is also being hosted on the website of the Company at https://www.jswcement.in/.

data.caption: Update On Securities Purchase Agreement Under Regulation 30 And Other Applicable Provisions Of The Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to the intimations made by JSW Cement Limited ("Company") on 7th November 2025 and 17th November 2025 intimating you inter alia of the execution of the Securities Purchase Agreement amongst Nuvoco Vistas Corporation Limited ("Purchaser") the Company (Seller 1) Alpha Alternatives Holdings Limited (Seller 2 therein) (together the "Sellers") and Algebra Endeavour Private Limited [the holding Company of Vadraj Energy (Gujarat) Limited having power plants at Kutch and Surat] ("Algebra") for the transfer of 100% of the securities of Algebra respectively held by the Sellers to the Purchaser (the "Securities Purchase Agreement"). 

This is to inform you that Sellers have today completed the transaction under the Securities Purchase Agreement and thereby transferred 100% of the securities of Algebra to the Purchaser.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations we hereby inform you that the Company has scheduled a Result Conference Call on Thursday 5th February 2026 at 10:00 a.m. (Indian Standard Time) to discuss the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025.

A copy of the invitation is attached for your information.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for  Considering And Approving The Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter Ended 31St December 2025.
data.news_body: JSW Cement Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended 31st December 2025. In view of the above and further to our intimation dated 23rd December 2025 the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company has been closed for all the Designated Persons from Thursday 1st January 2026 till Friday 6th February 2026.

data.caption: Issuance Of Corporate Guarantee
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited ("the Company") has  in its meeting held today on 7th November 2025 inter alia considered and accorded their approval for providing Corporate Guarantee in favor of any bank/institution for sanction of working capital facility(ies) to JSW Cement FZC a Joint  Venture  (between JSW Cement Ltd. North Star Fund and Rialto Fund) wherein the Company hold 55% shares.

data.caption: Approval For Entering Into A Power Purchase Agreement With JSW Green Energy Fifteen Limited And Subscribing To 26% Equity Stake Of JSW Green Energy Fifteen Limited
data.news_body: This is to inform you the Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited has in its meeting held on 7th November 2025 inter alia considered and accorded its approval for entering into Power Purchase Agreement with JSW Green Energy Fifteen Limited for the purchase of solar power from captive solar energy power plant and in this connection the Company will be subscribing to 26% equity stake in JSW Green Energy Fifteen Limited.

data.caption: Approval For Execution Of Securities Purchase Agreement
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited has in its meeting held today ie. on Friday 7th November 2025 inter alia considered and accorded its approval for execution of Securities Purchase Agreement amongst Nuvoco Vistas Corporation Limited (Purchaser). JSW Cement Limited (the Company-Seller 1 therein) and Alpha Alternatives Holding Private Limited (Seller 2 therein) (together "Sellers") and Algebra Endeavours Private Limited ("Algebra")(the holding company of Vadraj Energy (Gujarat) Limited having power plants at Kutch and Surat) for the transfer of whole of securities of Algebra respectively held by the Sellers to the Purchaser.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: This is to inform that the Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited has in its meeting held today i.e. on Friday 7th November 2025 inter-alia considered and approved the appointment of Mr. Sudhir Maheshwari as an Additional Director (Non-Executive and Non-Independent Director) of the Company with effect from 7th November 2025 subject to the approval of the Shareholders pursuant to Regulation 17(1C) of SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Monitoring Agency Report For The Quarter Ended 30Th September 2025
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 32 of the SEBI ( Lisitng Obligations and Disclousres Requirements) Regulations 2015 read with Regulation 41 of the SEBI (Issue of Capital and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2018.Please find enclosed Monitoring Agency Report towards utilization of proceeds of Intial Public Offer for the Quarter and Half Year ended 30th September 2025 issued by CRISIL Ratings Limited duly reviewed and taken on record by the Board of Directors and the Audit COmmittee of the Company on 7th November 2025.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On 7Th November 2025 Of JSW Cement Limited
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 pf the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today has  inter-alia approved the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended 30th September 2025.

data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 pf the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors at its meeting held today has  inter-alia approved the unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter and Half year ended 30th September 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Boad Meeting Outcome Dated 7Th November 2025 Of JSW Cement Limited
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of JSW Cement Limited has in its meeting held today i.e.on Friday 7th November 2025 inter alia considered and approved the Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended 30th September 2025 (Unaudited Financial Results).The Board Meeting commenced at 3.00 p.m. and concluded at 6.45 p.m.
Further pursuant to the applicable provisions of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 (SEBI Regulations) please find enclosed herewith:
(i) the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended 30th September 2025; and
(ii) Limited Review Report dated 7th November 2025 issued by the Statutory Auditors of the Company with respect to the Unaudited Financial Results and taken on record by the Board of Directors of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Director
data.news_body: Mr. Utsav Baijal (DIN: 02592194) Non-Executive Nominee Director has tendered his resignation from the Board of Directors of the Company with effect from the close of business hours on 04th November 2025.

The transcript in relation to the aforesaid call will be made available at the website of the Company i.e. https://www.jswcement.in/.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 ("Listing Regulations") we wish to inform you that Crisil Ratings Limited has revised the credit rating of Shiva Cement Limited which is a subsidiary of JSW Cement Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulation 2015 ("Listing Regulations") we wish to inform you that Crisil Ratings Limited ("Crisil") have upgraded the credit ratings of the Company.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of JSW Cement Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 14 2025 the equity shares of JSW Cement Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544480) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250813-  dated August 13 2025.
